Posts.EditableText:
Will it be possible to increase the upload game size limit from 50 MB to (75MB or 100 MB)? My files are 180MB, and it took me a while to reduce the BASE64 image sizes down to 50MB.

If so, that will be helpful.

Posts.EditableText: Agreed. I've been shrinking all my picture files just to make it all fit. Hate to lose all this work because one or two of us make massive games. They should only restrict it if it becomes a problem.
